  • Method Details

    • getAllPersons

      @GetMapping("") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Iterable<PersonOutputDto>> getAllPersons()
      GET request to get all persons from the database
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with OK http status code and a list with all persons

    • getPersonById

      @GetMapping("/id/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<PersonOutputDto> getPersonById(@PathVariable("id") Long personId)
      GET method to get one person by id from the database
      Parameters:
      personId - ID of the person for which information is requested
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with OK http status code and the requested person

    • getPersonByName

      @GetMapping("/name/{lastName}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> getPersonByName(@PathVariable("lastName") String lastName)
      GET method to get one person by last name from the database
      Parameters:
      lastName - the lastname for which person information is requested
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with OK http status code and a list with all persons with given lastname

    • getDogBreeders

      @GetMapping("/dogbreeders") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<PersonOutputDto>> getDogBreeders()
      GET method to get a list of all persons with one or more breed dogs
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with OK http status code and a list with all persons with a breed dog

    • createPerson

      @PostMapping("") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> createPerson(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid PersonInputDto personInputDto, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
      POST method to create a new person in the database
      Parameters:
      personInputDto - Data Transfer Objects that carries data between processes in order to reduce the number of methods calls
      bindingResult - a Spring object that holds the result of the validation and binding and contains errors that may have occurred
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with created http status code and URI pointing to the newly created entity, or bindingResultError if there is an error in the binding

    • updatePerson

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> updatePerson(@PathVariable("id") Long personId, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid PersonInputDto personInputDto, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
      PUT method to update (if person exists) or create (if person does not exist) a person
      Parameters:
      personId - ID of the person for which information is requested
      personInputDto - Data Transfer Objects that carries data between processes in order to reduce the number of methods calls
      bindingResult - a Spring object that holds the result of the validation and binding and contains errors that may have occurred
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with ok http status code and updated or created person, or bindingResultError if there is an error in the binding

    • patchPerson

      @PatchMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> patchPerson(@PathVariable("id") Long personId, @RequestBody PersonPatchDto personPatchDto)
      PATCH method that updates a person only when the person exists in the database
      Parameters:
      personId - ID of the person for which information is requested
      personPatchDto - Data Transfer Objects that carries data between processes in order to reduce the number of methods calls
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with OK http status code and the updated person, or bindingResultError if there is an error in the binding

    • deletePerson

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> deletePerson(@PathVariable("id") Long personId)
      DELETE method to delete a person from the database by id
      Parameters:
      personId - ID of the person for which information is requested
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with no content http status code
